roleset.name: minimally state (such as reporting a quantity at a level too low)

example.name: with Arg2 as PP
example.text: The Commerce Department found that U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports , were understated by $ 20.9 billion a year

propbank.arg: U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports

example.name: with Arg2 as different PP
example.text: The Commerce Department found that U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports , were understated at the annualized rate of $ 25.4 billion in the first quarter of 1989 .

propbank.arg: U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports
at the annualized rate of $ 25.4 billion

example.name: misparsed arg1
example.text: Our five - year plan contains three accounting devices -- negative money , an above guidance management reserve and optimistic inflation estimates -- which understate the spending the Pentagon has committed itself to by almost $ 100 billion .

propbank.arg: the spending the Pentagon has committed itself to by almost $ 100 billion

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: a 0.7 percentage point understatement in growth of total real GNP

propbank.arg: in growth of total real GNP

roleset.note: UNDERSTATEMENT-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison with understate.01-v. No VN or FN classess. Framed by Katie. (from understatement.01-n)
